item.title: Food that ≠kasin says he does not eat
item.summary: ≠kasin does not eat certain foods such as fish, crabs, fowls or pigs; his father does eat fish, but his mother does not.
item.comments: 1) This short note appears to be an accompaniment to words that appear on the contents page of the notebook, 2) This story is found in Book IV-3
item.author: ≠kasin (Klaas Katkop) (IV)

keyword.subkw: food that ≠kasin says he does not eat
